column1: #Text=It must be nice to sit back in academia, with benefits and tenure, and debate points in the media.
#Text=Non residents are assessed a tax if they purchase real estate.
#Text=It applies to Americas, Italians, and the Chinese, that are non residents.
#Text=Actually, if you are really not too burdened in academia, think about all the Canadians and residents that cannot affort a place to live in BC.
#Text=It is not always about you, Professor.
